page.title: 18SOCIAL SURVEY-BEENHAM.
page.content: SURVEY OF 48 FAMILIES IN BEENHAM SCHOOL. CARS; The survey showed that two families had no car,while 17 had one car,23 had two cars and six families had more than two cars. TELEVISION; Fourteen families had one television, while 22 had two sets and 12 had more than two television sets. Two families owned horses; 20 families had dogs, 19 had a computer, while 18 had holidays abroad.Two families have relatives living in the village, 23 mums worked and most dads cmmuted to surrounding towns while 5 travelled afar, including one working abroad. The survey reflects the changes in the village, some ten years ago 15% of the families had no car,few homes had more than one T.V and few mums worked. 10% of the dads worked locally with 45% having relatives living in Beenham
